articles.title: IndianOil unveils India's first green hydrogen-run bus that emits just water - BusinessLine
articles.description: India’s top oil firm, Indian Oil Corporation (IOC), unveiled the nation’s first green hydrogen-powered bus, powered by 75 kg of green hydrogen produced using renewable electricity. This initiative represents India’s transition away from fossil fuels. The buse…
articles.content:
India's top oil firm IOC on September 25 unveiled the nation's first green hydrogen-powered bus that emits just water as it takes the lead in bringing out unrivaled tools to replace fossil fuels.

articles.title: L&Ts Rs 10,000-Crore Buyback Subscribed Nearly Five Times On Final Day - BQ Prime
articles.description: The buyback has been subscribed for a total of 15.61 crore shares so far in Sept. 25 compared with the offer of 3.13 crore.
articles.content:
Larsen and Toubro Ltd.'s Rs 10,000 crore buyback was oversubscribed on the last day of its buyback, led by qualified institutional buyers.

articles.title: August 2023 crude steel production - worldsteel.org - World Steel Association
articles.description: World crude steel production for the 63 countries reporting to the World Steel Association (worldsteel) was 152.6 million tonnes (Mt) in August 2023, a 2.2% increase compared to August 2022.
